get.description: Get My Policies in a Map belongs to a Role For UI usage

put.description: Update Account InEmail if the status is draft

delete.description: move Account InEmail to bin then delete it if it's already in the bin

get.description: Get All Resources Defined in the system
Get All Resources defined in the system with role permission on them

post.description: Login using account credentials passed using basic auth method
Login using account client_id and client secret passed using basic auth method

data.description: if the request were successful the data will be saved here

error.description: Generic General Error Message defined in the system

message.description: More detailed error message indicates why the request was unsuccessful

success.description: Response flag indicates whether the HTTP request was successful or not

original.description: in the admin panel the broker only need to see one version of the email
Default system Roles (can't be changed) or deleted

BearerAuth.description: Type "BearerAuth" followed by a space and Access token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
